gravestones.cannot_open_wrong_player: Only th' sailor who owns this booty be able t' access it!
tag.enchantment.gravestones.skips_graves: Is not buried in a Dead Man's Chest
tag.item.gravestones.skips_gravestones: Is not buried in a Dead Man's Chest
commands.gravestones.deaths.recover: Recovered yer booty from Davy Jones' Locker
Dead Man's Chest 'as a spawnDate o' %1$s and a graveOwner o' %2$s (%3$s)
Dead Man's Chest be filled with: %s
Dead Man's Chest 'as a spawnDate o' %s but not a graveOwner!
There be no Dead Man's Chests here!
commands.gravestones.getdata.player.cann: Th' log o' Dead Man's Chests could not be found!
Th' log o' Dead Man's Chests could not be read!
commands.gravestones.getdata.player.grav: %1$s's Dead Man's Chests be buried towards: %2$s, %3$s, %4$s
configs.gravestones.decay_with_deaths.to: If yer Dead Man's Chest weathers further upon yer untimely death
configs.gravestones.decay_with_time.tool: If yer Dead Man's Chest weathers further th' longer ye be sailin'
configs.gravestones.decay_time.tooltip: How long it be takin' fer th' sea to weather Dead Man's Chests
configs.gravestones.decay_time_type.tool: If yer Dead Man's Chest be weathered every moon (Days in all), or only while ye be upon th' waves (Days at sea). Unloadin' yer chunks won't save yer chests!
configs.gravestones.store_experience.too: If yer Dead Man's Chest contains yer knowledge points. If not, yer knowledge be scattered upon th' ground!
configs.gravestones.experience_cap.toolt: If yer Dead Man's Chest can only hold so much knowledge. This limit be th' same as vanilla (100 points)
configs.gravestones.experience_kept.tool: How th' knowledge ye bury be figured out. Either no knowledge be lost, a fraction be kept, or it makes use o' th' vanilla calculation (7 * current level)
configs.gravestones.experience_decay.too: If th' weatherin' o' yer Dead Man's Chest also weathers th' knowledge within. If so, th' knowledge unburied be partitioned by th' weatherin' stage (stage 1 'as 100%, stage 2 'as 50%, and stage 3 'as 33%)
configs.gravestones.gravestone_accessibl: If sailors other than th' Dead Man's Chest's owner be prohibited from unburyin' th' chest
configs.gravestones.broadcast_collect_in: Whether unburyin' yer Dead Man's Chest be gossiped about t' th' crew
configs.gravestones.broadcast_coordinate: Whether th' bearings t' yer Dead Man's Chest be gossiped about t' th' crew
configs.gravestones.aesthetic_gravestone: Whether false Dead Man's Chests be permitted fer trickin' yer enemies
configs.gravestones.spawn_gravestone_ske: Release Dead Man's Bags o' Bones
If Dead Man's Chests release Dead Man's Bags o' Bones when their owners be approachin'
configs.gravestones.console_info.tooltip: If arcane knowledge about yer Dead Man's Chests be recorded in the Ship's Log. This be a tool fer Poseidon!
configs.gravestones.show_heads.tooltip: If th' head o' a fallen pirate be sittin' at the foot o' their Dead Man's Chest
configs.gravestones.time_format.tooltip: Th' way in which yer untimely death be displayed on yer Dead Man's Chest
modmenu.summaryTranslation.gravestones: Adds Dead Man's Chests that be buried with yer booty upon yer death.
modmenu.descriptionTranslation.graveston:
Adds Dead Man's Chests that be buried with yer booty upon yer death.

Called "Gravestones" by th' landlubbers!
